        public double vectorAngle(Vector2D v)
        Gives the angle between this and a vector v. Gives the correct sign of the angle between -Pi and Pi

        Returns:

      • isColinear

        public boolean isColinear(Vector2D vect,
                          double tolerance)
        Checks if this is colinear to another vector with a given tolerance. The cross-multiplication is normalised with the norms to keep the tolerance value independant from vectors norm.
        Parameters:
        vect -
        Returns:
